entry.title: 3M T-8 - PetRolleum Sorbent Mini-Boom 6 Mini-Boo 7000001922
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Sorbent Products
Price: 160.31

[shortdesc]

3M Petroleum Sorbent Mini-Boom, T-8, 76 mm x 2.5 m (3 in x 8 ft)

  • 3M Petroleum Sorbent Mini-Boom, T-8 is used to encircle spills and to contain leaks
  • It is selective sorbent, which will Inchsorb Inch hydrocarbon-based liquids (oleophilic) and repel aqueous-based liquids (hydrophobic)
  • A 3-inch (7.6 cm) diameter scrim on the outside of the boom identifies the use while containing particulate sorbent material
  • The T-8 mini-boom is 8 feet (2.4 m) in length
  • A case weighs 12 pounds (5.4 kg)
  • Each case contains 6 booms (each 3 inches (7.6 cm) in diameter by 8 feet (2.4 m)) which will sorb 2 gallons (9 litre) each.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Sorbent Products

    Product Information

  • Ideal for placing around equipment
  • Helps prevent leaks/spills from spreading to adjacent areas
  • Scrim on the outside of mini-boom identifies the use while containing particulate Sorbent material

entry.title: SpilKleen AN1KG - Acid Neutralizer Dry 1 Kg Bottles
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpilKleen
Type: Neutralizers
Price: 19.09

[shortdesc]
  • The use of toxicity reduction agents is essential in the proper treatment and subsequent handling of hazardous material spills and process materials
  • A hazardous material has not been properly dealt with until it has been rendered harmless
  • Neutralizers minimize the risk of dealing with hazardous spills and wastes
  • Neutralized products and/or absorbents can be considered non-hazardous and may be disposed of in an environmentally safe manner
  • Acid neutralizer in powder form quickly and efficiently neutralizes concentrated acid spills
  • The neutralization reaction generates harmless gases
  • The residue is environmentally harmless and easily disposed of
  • For maximum safety, an indicator system is included that will show when the spill is completely neutralized
  • One kilogram will neutralize approximately: 500 ml of sulphuric acid 96 % 550 ml of phosphoric acid 85 % 660 ml of nitric acid 70 % 250 ml of hydrochloric acid 32 % 310 ml of chlorosulphonic acid Part #: AN1KG dry, 1kg shaker
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand SpilKleen
    Product Type Neutralizers

entry.title: SpilKleen CN1L - Caustic Neutralizer Liquid 1L Bottles
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpilKleen
Type: Neutralizers
Price: 26.08

[shortdesc]
  • The use of toxicity reduction agents is essential in the proper treatment and subsequent handling of hazardous material spills and process materials
  • A hazardous material has not been properly dealt with until it has been rendered harmless
  • Neutralizers minimize the risk of dealing with hazardous spills and wastes
  • Neutralized products and/or absorbents can be considered non-hazardous and may be disposed of in an environmentally safe manner
  • Caustic neutralizer in a liquid form is a concentrated neutralizer for liquid caustic spills
  • It will effectively neutralize most pure alkali materials quickly
  • The reaction products are environmentally safe and can be flushed into the standard drainage system
  • For maximum safety, it contains an indicator system that will show when the spill is completely neutralized
  • One liter ( 1.2 Kg ) will neutralize approx.: 500 ml of sodium hydroxide 50% 600 ml of potassium hydroxide 45% 1000 ml of ammonium hydroxide 30% Part #: CN1L - liquid, 1L, 12/case
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand SpilKleen
    Product Type Neutralizers

entry.title: SpilKleen MVS1 - Mercury Vapour Suppressant 600Gm Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpilKleen
Type: Spill Control Other
Price: 37.51

[shortdesc]
  • The use of toxicity reduction agents is essential in the proper treatment and subsequent handling of hazardous material spills and process materials
  • A hazardous material has not been properly dealt with until it has been rendered harmless
  • Neutralizers minimize the risk of dealing with hazardous spills and wastes
  • Neutralized products and/or absorbents can be considered non-hazardous and may be disposed of in an environmentally safe manner
  • When mercury is spilled, it can break up into fine particles that disperse and infiltrate inaccessible areas
  • These particles, if left untreated, continuously release mercury vapours into the air
  • These vapours are heavy and can build up to toxic levels
  • This mercury vapour suppressant has been specially developed to deal with highly dispersed mercury
  • The chemically activated particles bind to mercury surfaces and absorb mercury vapour
  • This suppressant is ideally suited to penetrate inaccessible areas, such as cracks and crevices, where mercury particles can reside
  • It is easy to apply and will effectively suppresses the generation of vapours to well below hazardous levels
  • It is convenient and safe for workers to use
  • Part # MVS1 - 600 gm bottle
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand SpilKleen
    Product Type Spill Control Other

Vendor: SpilKleen
Type: Neutralizers
Price: 29.02

[shortdesc]
  • The use of toxicity reduction agents is essential in the proper treatment and subsequent handling of hazardous material spills and process materials
  • A hazardous material has not been properly dealt with until it has been rendered harmless
  • Neutralizers minimize the risk of dealing with hazardous spills and wastes
  • Neutralized products and/or absorbents can be considered non-hazardous and may be disposed of in an environmentally safe manner

  • The use of toxicity reduction agents is essential in the proper treatment and subsequent handling of hazardous material spills and process materials
  • A hazardous material has not been properly dealt with until it has been rendered harmless

entry.title: SpilKleen M1000 - Ph Indicator Tape No
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpilKleen
Type: Indicators
Price: 46.04

[shortdesc]
  • Used for rapid pH testing directly at the point of interest, strips are always ready for immediate use
  • They are also suitable for careful testing of dangerous, poisonous, or aggressive liquids as the long handle prevents fingers from coming into contact with the sample
  • The dye is chemically bound to the test strip and cannot bleed into the sample, protecting against contamination and enabling measurement in weakly buffered or strongly alkaline solutions
  • Included color chart has 4 different color blocks for each pH value, enabling highly precise pH determination.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand SpilKleen
    Product Type Indicators
